500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞 Pinyin 500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞 500五百 parasols遮阳伞 五百500 遮阳伞parasols Once upon a time, there was a very wise and compassionate man. 很久以前，有一个非常聪明、富有同情心的人。 once upon a time很久以前 there was a有一个 very非常 wise聪明 and和 compassionate富有同情心的 man人 很久以前once upon a time 有一个there was a 非常very 聪明wise 富有同情心的compassionate 人man Many people came to the wise man because he helped them understand difficult things about life. 这个人能帮助人们理解生活中困难的事情，大家都来找他帮忙。 many people许多人 came to来找 the wise man智者 because因为 he他 helped帮助了 them他们 understand理解 difficult things about life生活中困难的事情 这个人this person 能can 帮助help 人们people 理解understand 生活中困难的事情difficult things about life 大家everyone 都all 来找come to 他him 帮忙help They came to him because of his great love for all people. 也因为这个人的大爱包容, 大家都喜欢找他帮忙。 they他们 came to来找 him他 because of因为 his他的 great love大爱 for对 all people所有人 也因为also because 这个人的this person's 大爱包容great love and tolerance 大家everyone 都all 喜欢like 找come to 他him 帮忙help One day, some children decided to visit this great man. 有一天，小朋友们决定去拜访这位智者。 one day有一天 some一些 children小朋友们 decided决定 to visit去拜访 this这位 great man伟大的人 有一天one day 小朋友们the children 决定decided 去拜访to visit 这位this 智者wise man The children wanted to bring the perfect gift. 小朋友们想带一份最好的礼物送给他。 the children小朋友们 wanted想 to bring带 the这 perfect完美的 gift礼物 小朋友们the children 想wanted 带to bring 一份a 最好的best 礼物gift 送给他to give to him But they could not decide what it should be. 但他们无法决定什么才是最好的礼物。 but但 they他们 could not无法 decide决定 what it should be它应该是什么 但but 他们they 无法could not 决定decide 什么才是what is 最好的the best 礼物gift So, they sat under a parasol in the hot sun and thought. 于是，在烈日下，他们坐在遮阳伞下思考。 so于是 they他们 sat坐 under a parasol在遮阳伞下 in the hot sun在烈日下 and和 thought思考 于是so 在烈日下in the hot sun 他们they 坐sat 在遮阳伞下under a parasol 思考thought They sat under a parasol in the cool rain and thought. 在凉雨中，他们坐在遮阳伞下思考。 they他们 sat坐 under a parasol在遮阳伞下 in the cool rain在凉雨中 and和 thought思考 在凉雨中in the cool rain 他们they 坐sat 在遮阳伞下under a parasol 思考thought As they thought, more and more children joined them. Every child brought a parasol and they all thought together. 正在思考的时候，越来越多的小朋友也加入了进来。每个小朋友都带了一把遮阳伞，大家一起来思考。 as they thought正在思考的时候 more and more越来越多的 children小朋友 joined加入了 them他们 every每个 child小朋友 brought带了 a一把 parasol遮阳伞 and和 they他们 all都 thought思考 together一起 正在思考的时候as they thought 越来越多的more and more 小朋友children 也also 加入了进来joined in 每个every 小朋友child 都all 带了brought 一把a 遮阳伞parasol 大家everyone 一起together 来思考came to think Finally, one child looked up at all the parasols and said, “Why don’t we give our parasols to the wise man?" 最后，一个小朋友抬头看了看所有的遮阳伞，说道："为什么不把我们的遮阳伞送给智者呢？” finally最后 one一个 child小朋友 looked up at抬头看了看 all the parasols所有的遮阳伞 and和 said说道 why don’t we我们为什么不 give给 our我们的 parasols遮阳伞 to给 the wise man智者 最后finally 一个one 小朋友child 抬头看了看looked up at 所有的遮阳伞all the parasols 说道said 为什么不把why not 我们的our 遮阳伞parasols 送给to give to 智者the wise man 呢modal particle “Our parasols have protected us from the sun. Our parasols have protected us from the rain. This is our greatest gift!” “这些遮阳伞保护我们不被太阳晒，保护我们不受雨淋。这就是最好的礼物呀！" our我们的 parasols遮阳伞 have protected保护 us我们 from the sun不被太阳晒 our我们的 parasols遮阳伞 have protected保护 us我们 from the rain不受雨淋 this is这就是 our我们的 greatest最好的 gift礼物 这些these 遮阳伞parasols 保护have protected 我们us 不被太阳晒from the sun 保护have protected 我们us 不受雨淋from the rain 这就是this is 最好的the best 礼物gift 呀* So, all the children decided to make their parasols the most beautiful they could be. 于是，小朋友们决定把自己的遮阳伞都变得漂漂亮亮的。 so于是 all the children所有小朋友 decided决定 to make让 their他们的 parasols遮阳伞 the most beautiful最漂亮的 they could be它们可能是 于是so 小朋友们the children 决定decided 把to make 自己的their own 遮阳伞parasols 都all 变得become 漂漂亮亮beautiful 的particle When they were done, there were 500 children and 500 brilliant parasols. 完成后，一共有500个小朋友和500把漂亮的遮阳伞。 when they were done完成后 there were有 500五百 children小朋友 and和 500五百 brilliant漂亮的 parasols遮阳伞 完成后when they were done 一共altogether 有there were 500个500 小朋友children 和and 500把500 漂亮的beautiful 遮阳伞parasols When the children arrived, the wise and compassionate man welcomed them and smiled. 当小朋友们去拜访智者的时候，这位聪明而富有同情心的人露出了灿烂的笑容，很欢迎大家。 when当 the children小朋友们 arrived到达时 the这位 wise聪明 and而 compassionate富有同情心的 man人 welcomed欢迎 them他们 and并 smiled微笑着 当when 小朋友们the children 去拜访went to visit 智者the wise men 的时候at the time 这位this 聪明wise 而and 富有同情心的compassionate 人man 露出了灿烂的笑容showed a big smile 很欢迎was very welcoming 大家 to everyone On the spot, he turned their beautiful gifts into one enormous, shining parasol. 他当场把这些美丽的礼物，变成了一把闪闪发光的巨大遮阳伞。 on the spot当场 he他 turned变 their他们的 beautiful美丽的 gifts礼物 into成了 one一把 enormous巨大 shining闪闪发光的 parasol遮阳伞 他he 当场on the spot 把preposition 这些these 美丽的beautiful 礼物gifts 变成了turned into 一把one 闪闪发光的shining 巨大enormous 遮阳伞parasol The parasol was so big, it covered the entire galaxy. 遮阳伞如此之大，覆盖了整个银河系。 the parasol遮阳伞 was是 so big如此之大 it它 covered覆盖了 the这 entire整个 galaxy银河系 遮阳伞the parasol 如此之大so big 覆盖了covered 整个entire 银河系galaxy When they looked up, the children saw all people and all worlds reflected in that single brilliant and beautiful parasol. 当孩子们抬起头时，看到所有的人和所有的地方都映照在这把美丽绚烂的遮阳伞上。 when当 they他们 looked up抬起头 the children孩子们 saw看到 all people所有的人 and和 all worlds所有的地方 reflected映照 in在 that那 single一把 brilliant绚烂 and和 beautiful美丽 parasol遮阳伞 当when 孩子们the children 抬起头looked up 时at the time 看到saw 所有的人all people 和and 所有的地方all worlds 都all 映照reflected 在in 这把this 美丽beautiful 绚烂brilliant 的of 遮阳伞parasol 上on What is this picture? 这张照片是什么？ deciding 决定 welcoming 欢迎 giving 送给 protecting 保护 What is this picture? 这张照片是什么？ arriving 到达 making 变得 visiting 拜访 thinking 思考 What is this picture? Listen to the question. 点击图片。听这个问题。 they thought about their gifts 思考要送什么礼物 they talked about the sun 谈论有关太阳的事 they decided to be cool 决定保持冷静 they protected their friends 保护自己的朋友 Click the picture. Listen to the question. 点击图片。听这个问题。 500 parasols 五百遮阳伞 all people and all worlds 所有的人和所有的地方 the wise man 智者 difficult things about life 生活中困难的事情 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ People came to the wise man because he . 大家都来找智者帮忙，是因为。 loved getting gifts 智者喜欢收到礼物 had beautiful parasols 智者有漂亮的遮阳伞 liked good food 智者喜欢收到礼物 helped people understand life 智者喜欢吃美食 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ The children wanted to bring to the wise man. 小朋友们想把送给智者。 cool rain 凉雨 their friends 朋友 the perfect gift 最好的礼物 the galaxy 银河系 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ The wise man turned the children’s parasols into . 智者把小朋友们的遮阳伞变成了。 a very large sun 一个大太阳 one enormous parasol 一把巨大遮阳伞 a galaxy 银河系 a perfect gift 最好的礼物 Retell the story! 重述故事！ Read out loud! 大声读出来！ The children wanted to bring the perfect gift. But they could not decide what it should be. As they thought, more and more children joined them. Finally, one child looked up at all the parasols and said, “Why don’t we give our parasols to the wise man?" “Our parasols have protected us from the sun. They have protected us from the rain. This is our greatest gift!” 小朋友们想带一份最好的礼物送给他。但他们无法决定什么才是最好的礼物。 正在思考的时候，越来越多的小朋友也加入了进来。最后，一个小朋友抬头看了看所有的遮阳伞，说道："为什么不把我们的遮阳伞送给智者呢？” “这些遮阳伞保护我们不被太阳晒，保护我们不受雨淋。这就是最好的礼物呀！" Record your answer. 记录你的答案。 Write a sentence about this picture. 写一句关于这张照片。 Write your answer. 写你的答案。 Why were the parasols the children’s greatest gift? 为什么小朋友们觉得遮阳伞是最好的礼物？ Write your answer. 写你的答案。 What did you like about the story? 你喜欢这个故事的什么内容？ Match the words! 匹配单词！ to decide 决定 to protect 保护 to give 送给 to think 思考 to make 变得 to visit 拜访 500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞
